name: 8BallMonsters
description:
The goal of this game is to pocket all the balls of the monster.

If you are facing any bugs in windows version. You can press R to reset the scene.

If you own a muse headset and android phone. You can play with your headset which will generate a barrier once you are concentrating.

This is just a prototype of a "Titan souls" styled game.

Hope you like the idea. A more comprehensive version will be released after May.

BTW, I'm looking for talent pixel and 3D modeling artist who wish to join the development as a partner for this game. 

You  can find me at Eager#3843 on discord. Thanks!
